edu.umd.cs.psl.sampler

Class AbstractHitAndRunSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.sampler.AbstractHitAndRunSampler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sampler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearSampler, UniformSampler

    public abstract class AbstractHitAndRunSampler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sampler
    Samples points in a constrained continuous Markov random field, using the "hit-and-run" sampling scheme described in Broecheler and Getoor, "Computing marginal distributions over continuous Markov networks for statistical relational learning." NIPS 2010. Subclasses of this abstract class should implement specific uses of the sampled points.
